GameLogic.name: GameLogic
GameLogic.description:
Enhanced Shared Game Logic Hook
  
  This hook provides comprehensive poker game logic that can be shared across
  Live Mode, Solver Mode, Training Mode, and future Play Mode.
  
  Features:
  - Enhanced state tracking with all player information
  - Cross-mode state persistence and restoration
  - Comprehensive card state management
  - Betting round management with action history
  - Pot and stack management
  - Folded cards tracking
  - Side pot calculations
  - Card visibility management
  - Winner state management

imports.line: import { Card, Button, Modal, Form, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap'
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'

HandBreakdownChart.name: HandBreakdownChart
HandBreakdownChart.description:
Renders a visual bar chart showing hand strength breakdowns with win/loss/tie percentages
  The breakdown object structure:
    {
      "Two Pair": { wins: 10, ties: 2, losses: 15, total: 27 },
      "Full House": { wins: 5, ties: 0, losses: 1, total: 6 },
      ...
    }

HandBreakdownTable.name: HandBreakdownTable
HandBreakdownTable.description:
Renders a visual chart showing hand strength breakdowns with win/loss/tie percentages.
  The breakdown object can be shaped as:
    {    "Flush": 12,                        // counts treated as wins
         "Full House": { wins: 3, ties: 1, losses: 2 },
         "Two Pair": { count: 7 }           // shorthand, treated as wins
    }
